mapper.select: select count(*) from seller where s_nickname=#{s_nickname}
select count(*) from seller where s_email=#{s_email}
mapper.insert: insert into seller (s_email, s_password, s_nickname, s_tel, s_address, s_zipcode, s_detailaddress, s_author, s_name) values (#{s_email}, #{s_password}, #{s_nickname}, #{s_tel}, #{s_address}, #{s_zipcode}, #{s_detailaddress}, #{s_author}, #{s_name})
mapper.select: SELECT S_EMAIL ,S_NICKNAME,S_IMG FROM SELLER WHERE S_EMAIL = #{s_email} UNION all SELECT B_EMAIL AS S_EMAIL,B_NICKNAME AS S_NICKNAME, B_IMG AS S_IMG FROM BUYER WHERE B_EMAIL = #{s_email}
SELECT DISTINCT S.*, (SELECT COUNT(S_ID) FROM WISHLIST WHERE S_STATUS='U' AND S_ID = S.S_EMAIL) AS WISHCOUNT FROM SELLER S, WISHLIST W WHERE S.S_EMAIL = W.S_ID ORDER BY WISHCOUNT DESC

SELECT RANK FROM (SELECT S.S_EMAIL, COUNT(*), RANK() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) AS RANK FROM REVIEW R, SERVICE S WHERE SER_CODE = SCODE GROUP BY S.S_EMAIL ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) WHERE S_EMAIL = #{s_email}
